page.title: 10A DAY AT BUDEHAVEN SCHOOL
page.content: Budehaven School is a mixed,split-site {comprehensive school}of about 940 pupils.It ranges from 11-18 years of age.School starts at 9:00.I go in for {registration}which is followed by {Assembly}or a form period for 20mins. My first lesson starts at 9:25 and goes on until 10:30.This lesson is {music}which is enjoyable as we do practical tasks. We have a 20min break and the next lesson starts at 10:50.We have practical{science}where we do chemistry experiments.At 12:00 we have lunch.Sometimes I go to a club or just play outside.Afternoon lessons start at 1:20 and the first is{French.}After a 20min break we have{English}as the last lesson.School then ends at 3:55.
